articles.title: Market Basket launches its own beer — here’s where to buy it
articles.description:
The beloved grocery chain partnered with Vermont’s Zero Gravity Beer to create its “More For Your Dollar” lager.

The post Market Basket launches its own beer — here’s where to buy it appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Market Basket introduces 'More For Your Dollar' lager in partnership with Zero Gravity Beer.
Beer available at all Market Basket locations starting November 6, 2025.
Local residents can enjoy a new affordable beer option from a trusted grocery chain.
